titles.title: Gun-Owner Registration Information Protection Act
A bill to prohibit the Federal funding of a State firearms ownership database.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

bill.summary: 3/11/2014--Introduced. Gun-Owner Registration Information Protection Act - Prohibits any federal agency from supporting (by funding or other means) the establishment or maintenance by a state or political subdivision of any listing of firearms lawfully possessed or owned by private persons, or of persons who lawfully possess or own firearms, except in the case of firearms that have been reported as lost or stolen.
